purpose: 列出 SAT 平均总分最高的 Top 10 学校
scenario: 学术 excellence 排名、媒体发布、学校对标
pg_sql:
SELECT
school_name,
district_name,
county_name,
avg_total_sat_score,
excellence_rate,
num_test_takers
FROM school_performance_summary
ORDER BY avg_total_sat_score DESC
LIMIT 10;
comments: 用途：列出 SAT 平均总分最高的 Top 10 学校
场景：学术 excellence 排名、媒体发布、学校对标

purpose: 列出卓越率（SAT ≥1500 比例）最高的 Top 10 学校
scenario: 识别顶尖人才培养能力强的学校，用于表彰或研究
pg_sql:
SELECT
school_name,
district_name,
county_name,
excellence_rate,
avg_total_sat_score,
num_test_takers
FROM school_performance_summary
WHERE num_test_takers >= 50  -- 过滤小样本学校
ORDER BY excellence_rate DESC
LIMIT 10;
comments: 用途：列出卓越率（SAT ≥1500 比例）最高的 Top 10 学校
场景：识别顶尖人才培养能力强的学校，用于表彰或研究

purpose: 查询洛杉矶县（Los Angeles）所有学校的学业表现
scenario: 区域教育分析、地方教育局监控
pg_sql:
SELECT
school_name,
avg_total_sat_score,
excellence_rate,
pct_eligible_frpm AS low_income_rate
FROM school_full_profile
WHERE county_name = 'Los Angeles'
ORDER BY excellence_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：查询洛杉矶县（Los Angeles）所有学校的学业表现
场景：区域教育分析、地方教育局监控

purpose: 发现“低收入比例高但成绩优异”的逆袭学校（教育公平典范）
scenario: 寻找成功案例、推广先进经验、政策试点参考
pg_sql:
SELECT
sp.school_name,
sp.district_name,
sp.county_name,
sp.avg_total_sat_score,
sp.excellence_rate,
eco.pct_eligible_frpm AS low_income_rate,
sp.num_test_takers
FROM school_performance_summary sp
JOIN school_socioeconomic_profile eco ON sp.cds = eco.cds
WHERE
eco.pct_eligible_frpm > 0.7                    -- 低收入学生占比 >70%
AND sp.avg_total_sat_score > (SELECT AVG(avg_total_sat_score) FROM school_performance_summary)  -- 高于全州平均
AND sp.num_test_takers >= 30                   -- 保证样本量
ORDER BY sp.excellence_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：发现“低收入比例高但成绩优异”的逆袭学校（教育公平典范）
场景：寻找成功案例、推广先进经验、政策试点参考

purpose: 比较特许学校（Charter）与普通学校的表现差异
scenario: 办学模式研究、政策效果评估
pg_sql:
SELECT
CASE WHEN eco.charter_school = 1 THEN 'Charter' ELSE 'Traditional' END AS school_type,
AVG(sp.avg_total_sat_score) AS avg_sat_score,
AVG(sp.excellence_rate) AS avg_excellence_rate,
AVG(eco.pct_eligible_frpm) AS avg_low_income_rate
FROM school_performance_summary sp
JOIN school_socioeconomic_profile eco ON sp.cds = eco.cds
GROUP BY eco.charter_school
ORDER BY avg_excellence_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：比较特许学校（Charter）与普通学校的表现差异
场景：办学模式研究、政策效果评估

purpose: 分析磁校（Magnet Schools）是否在成绩上具有优势
scenario: 特色学校项目评估、招生策略制定
pg_sql:
SELECT
sm.is_magnet,
AVG(sp.avg_total_sat_score) AS avg_sat_score,
AVG(sp.excellence_rate) AS avg_excellence_rate
FROM school_metadata sm
LEFT JOIN school_performance_summary sp ON sm.cds = sp.cds
WHERE sm.is_magnet IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY sm.is_magnet
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：分析磁校（Magnet Schools）是否在成绩上具有优势
场景：特色学校项目评估、招生策略制定

purpose: 查找缺少官网或联系电话的学校（数据完整性检查）
scenario: 数据清洗、信息补全任务、系统维护
pg_sql:
SELECT
school_name,
district_name,
county_name,
phone,
website
FROM school_metadata
WHERE website IS NULL OR TRIM(website) = '' OR phone IS NULL
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：查找缺少官网或联系电话的学校（数据完整性检查）
场景：数据清洗、信息补全任务、系统维护

purpose: 获取可用于地图可视化的学校地理与绩效数据
scenario: BI 可视化（如 Power BI/Tableau）、Python 绘图（folium/mapbox）
pg_sql:
SELECT
sm.school_name,
sm.district_name,
sm.county_name,
sm.latitude,
sm.longitude,
sp.avg_total_sat_score,
sp.excellence_rate,
eco.pct_eligible_frpm AS low_income_rate
FROM school_metadata sm
LEFT JOIN school_performance_summary sp ON sm.cds = sp.cds
LEFT JOIN school_socioeconomic_profile eco ON sm.cds = eco.cds
WHERE sm.latitude IS NOT NULL AND sm.longitude IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 5;
comments: 用途：获取可用于地图可视化的学校地理与绩效数据
场景：BI 可视化（如 Power BI/Tableau）、Python 绘图（folium/mapbox）
